adjectives.description: assimilable (comparative more assimilable, superlative most assimilable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being assimilated; susceptible to assimilation.
examples: [â€¦]  very deep and large wounds are many times soon healed of themselves; i. e. meerly by the goodness of Nature it self, which being vigorous, and of our own provision furnished with convenient means, wholesom and assimilable Blood, doth every moment freshly apply it to the part that hath suffered solution of Continuity, and thereby redintegrate the same:
